{{Disambiguation}}

'''Debug''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{ItemLink|Debug Stick}}, item used to change various block states.
* {{EnvLink|Debug mode}}, world type used to test block states.
* [[Debug screen]], screen shown when {{key|F3}} is pressed.
* [[Debug hotkey]], hotkey involving the F3 key that shows hidden game information and settings.
* [[Debug renderer]], graphical tool showing technical information about the game.
* {{Cmd|debug}}{{only|JE|short=1}}, command used to start and stop debug sessions.
* [[Debug property]], flags that enable debugging features.
* <samp>[[debug.png]]</samp> and <samp>[[debug2.png]]</samp>, debugging assets found in the game's texture files.
* {{BlockSprite|Barrier}} [[debug_fourj_item]], an item once used in [[Legacy Console Edition]] for unknown debugging purposes.

Various game versions created for debugging purposes:
* [[Alpha v1.2.2a]]
* [[Beta 1.3a]]
* [[Beta 1.6 Test Build 3]]
* Numerous [[snapshot]]s and [[pre-release]]s
